[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: Include {
                span: Span(
                    3,
                    1,
                ),
                kind: Require,
                path: Concat {
                    left: MagicConst {
                        span: Span(
                            3,
                            9,
                        ),
                        constant: Directory,
                    },
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        17,
                    ),
                    right: LiteralString {
                        span: Span(
                            3,
                            19,
                        ),
                        value: "/foo.php",
                    },
                },
            },
            semicolon: Span(
                3,
                29,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
